tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal_sites (
    site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name TEXT,
    location POINT,
    disposal_date DATE,
    proximity_to_community FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal_sites (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  location GEOGRAPHY,
  disposal_volume DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE communities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  community_name TEXT,
  population INT,
  location GEOGRAPHY
)

CREATE TABLE proximity_to_communities (
  disposal_site_id INT,
  community_id INT,
  distance DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (disposal_site_id, community_id)
)

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_types (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_history (
  disposal_site_id INT,
  waste_type_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  volume_disposed DECIMAL,
  PRIMARY KEY (disposal_site_id, waste_type_id, disposal_date)
)
